summary: The implementation covers all major requirements: romantic landing page with 'Nibtahil, will you be mine?' question, pink/white color scheme, Yes/No buttons with moving No button behavior, image display on Yes click, and mobile responsiveness. However, the actual image file (431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg) is missing from the diff, meaning REQ-5 is not fulfilled.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the uploaded romantic emoji image as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
missing_requirements.reason: The image file 431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg is referenced in App.tsx but does not appear in the diff as an added file in frontend/public/assets/generated/

hallucinated_features.description: Floating hearts background decoration with animated hearts using lucide-react icons
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest. The requirement only specified a 'simple and romantic-themed' design with pink/white colors, not animated floating hearts.
